description:
Ao has turned hostile. In order to escape his attacks, Mugino attempts a risky strategy, which allows Boruto and the others to escape. Boruto and his friends are shocked at the events that have unfolded, but then Katasuke confesses something even more shocking. Meanwhile, after allowing Boruto and the others to escape, Ao is visited by Koji Kashin, a member of Kara—the Husk.
Source: crunchyroll
